query:
MATCH p =
  (g:Group)
  -[:CoerceAndRelayToSMB]
  -(a:Computer)
    -[:SCCM_AssignAllPermissions]
    ->(s:SCCM_Site)
WHERE
  (size(split(s.siteSystemRoles, 'SMS Site Server@')) - 1) >= 2
AND a.SCCMSiteSystemRoles CONTAINS ('SMS Site Server@' + s.siteCode)
AND a.SMBSigningRequired = false
RETURN p
name: SCCM Hierarchy TAKEOVER-7
description: NTLM coercion and relay to SMB between primary and passive site servers
